title: MAC Frame drops/freezing when mouse stops
body: When I stop moving my mouse the game freezes. The game is still playing but the video freezes until I move my mouse again. I know other mac users have this issue as well but I have yet to find any solutions. Please do not reply unless you have actual solutions. This is on Mac.

replies.body: Does this happen under all Window modes, or does this only affect certain modes? You can change your Window Mode under your **VIDEO** settings in-game.
It is on Mac, under all modes.

Are you using the *Shake to find cursor* accessibility feature? If so, use [**this guide**](http://osxdaily.com/2015/10/08/disable-shake-to-find-cursor-mac-os-x/) to disable the feature and let me know if this fixed it for you.
Can confirm that too on a mid 2014 macbook pro with the Shake to find cursor option deactivated.
I can confirm this, the same happens to me on my Retina MacBook Pro (2013)
